QAPair.Question: What is (are) Whiteheads ?
QAPair.Answer: Whiteheads are small, white, raised bumps on the skin. They form when oil and skin collect in the pores. Whiteheads are also known as closed comedones and pimples. They are one type of acne , often on the face, chest and back. Related conditions include: Acne, Blackheads,
